name: Woad-Painted

skills.name: Cross Slash
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Has a 25% chance of placing a [Block Cooldown Skills] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK] [HP]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5'
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%

skills.name: Undying Fury
skills.raw_description:
Removes all debuffs from this Champion, then heals this Champion by 30% HP. Places a 30% [Reflect Damage] buff on this Champion for 2 turns.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Overpower
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 75% chance of placing a [Block Cooldown Skills] debuff for 2 turns. Damage inflicted is proportional to this Champion's current HP.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +59
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1
